metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1020014 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
docker-credential-helpers before 0.6.3 has a double free in the Listfunctions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1020014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: docker.io package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '18.09.7-0ubuntu1~16.04.5').
